title: [Tournament] Hash1Gaming: February Fatality

embed.description: Hey everyone, We're happy to announce that thanks to our newest sponsor KongComputers, we're able to officially announce our 5v5 Tournament for February 2015! Before joining our tournament, here's some information about how we'll be doing it: Registrations are open to both free agents and formed teams. Each team must consist of no less...

body:
Hey guys,

We're glad to announce that Hash One Gaming will be hosting a League of Legends 5v5 tournament in mid february for players in the Amateur League of Legends competitive scene! Thanks to Battlefy, we're accepting registrations for either pre-formed teams or free-agents. As a free agent, you'll be given the opportuinity to play with four other free agents on a randomly generated team. This process happens one week prior to the event so you'll be able to play beforehand and get to know eachother :).

Our signup page is below and our prizes/rules can be found on the registration page here: http://beta.hash1gaming.com/february-fatality/

If you've got any questions, just contact me via email at: Admin@Hash1Gaming.com

Cheers,

Tom G.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Pettanko,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=uAL2pEHJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-08T10:57:36.711+0000)
>
> No thanks Tom, please take your scam some place else, I speak for the OCE community and we dont need your kind here, thankyou, Tom.

Hey there Pettanko,

I'm not sure how this is a scam, we're advertising our 5v5 Tournament for february. 

Cheers,

Tom / iPlayHeaps

I believe this is a good thing, gives the OCE community some incentive to play some tourneys, meet new people and enjoy competitive play outside of solo queue. 

Thanks for the concern.

Still looking for players and teams!
Good luck all
